mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(mem_id, mem_name, mem_pw, mem_region, mem_addr, mem_child_grade, mem_phone, mem_email) VALUES(#{memId}, #{memName}, #{memPw}, #{memRegion}, #{memAddr},#{memChildGrade},#{memPhone},#{memEmail})
mapper.update: update member set mem_img = #{memImg}, mem_s_img = #{memSImg}, mem_region = #{memRegion}, mem_addr = #{memAddr}, mem_child_grade = #{memChildGrade}, mem_phone = #{memPhone}, mem_email = #{memEmail} where mem_id = #{memId}
